rv. anti-semitism means prejudice against jews, period. this has been discussed many times on the talk page.
Don't think so .... racism is racism. If it is bad for one group, it is also bad for another. Otherwise, why even have this article at all? Jews are not more "special" than other semitic groups.
/* Anti-Semitism in the Middle Ages */
No pandering to people seeking to whitewash anti-semitism here. RV anon
Reverted edits by 195.215.8.244 to last version by El_C; please make your case on the talk pages and not in edit comments
Don't think so .... racism is racism. If it is bad for one group, it is also bad for another. Otherwise, why even have this article at all? Jews are not more "special" than other semitic groups.
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/195.215.8.244|195.215.8.244]] to last version by Buffyg
I couldn't agree more with the previous contributor. There is absolutely no excuse for considering the Jews to be "more special" than other human beings. That in itself generates anti-jewish racism.
rv; how about you discuss these as opposed to going back and forth via edit comments?
There is unmistakable discrimination against other SEMITIC groups, such as the Arabs, as well, and there is no excuse to make a private racist club just for the Jews in an already racist context.
I'll take sides if I want. The term is used with reference to Jewish people -- http://dictionary.reference.com/search?q=anti-semitism
"El C" since you are and admin I strongly suggest that you not take side on this issue. Jews are not special just because they believe they are. They are just another semitic group. Racism is WRONG.

Rv. You need to justify your act by explaining why the word "semite" should exclude other semitic groups here. I am simply saying that "semitic" implies all semitic groups and Jews are not "special"
rv Discuss changes at talk first
If anti-semitism means only dislike for one particular semitic group, namely the Jews, then why insisting on calling it anti "semitism" instead of anti-Jewism? Only Jews count and nobody else?!
